name: Hold The Line (Joshua Lawton)
description:
Hold The Line is a Tower Defence gameplay prototype developed as my Final Major Project for my University degree.

Manage your units, give them formations and prepare for an assault of ever growing waves of enemies. Hold the line and keep your tower standing for as long as possible.

The game mechanics for this prototype are mostly tested and seemingly working, however such aspects as the income of gold, the higher level waves, balancing of different unit types, late game, are yet to be tested. Any feedback at all would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance :)
